brand.name: FLOWBills.ca

brand.description: AI-powered invoice automation for Canadian oil & gas operations

hero.title: Automate Invoices. Approve Faster. Close with Confidence.
hero.subtitle: AI-powered invoice processing built for Canadian oil & gas operations. From field tickets to financial close in minutes, not days.

ocr.title: AI-Powered OCR & Data Extraction
ocr.description: Instantly extracts vendor names, AFE numbers, PO references, amounts, dates from any invoice format

duplicate.title: Duplicate & Fraud Detection
duplicate.description: Intelligent algorithms catch duplicate invoices and suspicious patterns before they hit your books

hil.title: Human-in-the-Loop Review
hil.description: Routes low-confidence extractions to your team for quick validation and approval

compliance.title: Canadian Compliance & Enterprise Security
compliance.description: PIPEDA-compliant data handling, CASL-ready consent management, SOC 2 Type II certified infrastructure

workflow.title: Intelligent Workflow Automation
workflow.description: Smart routing based on amount thresholds, cost centers, GL codes, and approval hierarchies

integration.title: ERP & NOV Integration
integration.description: Pre-built connectors for SAP, Oracle, Sage, P2, Aucerna, and other oil & gas systems

canadian.title: Canadian Data Residency
canadian.description: Your data stays in Canada, compliant with provincial and federal regulations

industry.title: Oil & Gas Expertise
industry.description: Pre-configured for field tickets, joint venture billing, AFE tracking, revenue & royalty splits

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.description: Role-based access control, audit logging, SOC 2 compliance, encrypted data at rest and in transit

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your AP Process?
cta.subtitle: Join leading Canadian energy companies already saving hours every week
